title: PASSWORD
onboarding_1: Find out the secret word in Password!
onboarding_2: You have 6 tries to guess the word of the day.
onboarding_3: Enter any 5 letter word and tap SEND
onboarding_4: Letters highlighted in green are part of the secret word and are in their correct place.
onboarding_5: Letters highlighted in yellow are part of the word, but in the wrong place. Letters highlighted in gray are not found in the secret word.
onboarding_6: The highlighted letters will help you to better guess the secret word
settings_text: Select the language you want to play in:
quit_text: Are you sure you want to quit? You're so close!
unfilled_word: You need to type all the letters.
